subject: Re: Ticket Received - Re: A shipment from order #SSN4037 is on the way
description_text:
Hello,

I can't log in the support center and not possible to reset password

How can I read the answers in the ticket?

Francesco Bistolfi

 

Il 17/12/2025 15:25 CET service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

>  
>  
> 
> 
> 
> Hi Bistospam
> 
> We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created.
> A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).
> 
> To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
> https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8517?follow=email
> 
> Thank you for your patience.
> 
> 
> 
> View ticket https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8517?follow=email
> 
> If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8517?follow=email

> simsonn Support Team
